response.original_title: ガチでヤバい！！心霊動画
response.overview: This is a collection of various ghost videos based on the concept of "It's serious, it's bad! The concept of this site is to collect and record a variety of ghost videos. There are a wide variety of genres, such as the ghosts of victims of unsolved crimes, videos in which very evil spirits appear, and even some videos that once appeared in the world but were deleted due to restrictions. We hope you will take heart in watching these terrifying ghost videos.
response.title: Seriously Scary!! Supernatural Videos

titles.title: ガチでヤバい!!心霊動画
